channel.title: Comments on: Phil asks, “How do I transfer my iTunes account from a broken computer?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: hannah
item.dc:creator: hannah
item.description: Hi this worked fine until I clicked on the music file,it was full of smaller files named f1 -f50 I copied all across(was was so tedious) then I was left with individual singles in my itunes and not albums. It wouldn't let me copy 'music' . Pls help
item.content:encoded: Hi this worked fine until I clicked on the music file,it was full of smaller files named f1 -f50 I copied all across(was was so tedious) then I was left with individual singles in my itunes and not albums. It wouldn’t let me copy ‘music’ . Pls help

item.title: By: Kyle Tressel (@KyleTressel)
item.dc:creator: Kyle Tressel (@KyleTressel)
item.description: Nice! I'm surprised nobody comments here...anyways, not that long time ago I came across this wonderful app called iStick by Softorino and what can I say:) It looks pretty awesome! Google it!
item.content:encoded:
Nice! I’m surprised nobody comments here…anyways, not that long time ago I came across this wonderful app called iStick by Softorino and what can I say:)
It looks pretty awesome! Google it!
